revision.text:
==Details== ===Description=== The Battle Frontier is a place in Hoenn where your Pok√©mon fight teams of three without any of your assistance. [[Items]] are permitted however you cannot click to influence the outcome of the battle. You are rewarded with [[Battle Points]] at the end of the match which you can then use at the Battle Shop.
===Shop===
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Price !! Item |- |1 || [[Ultraball]] |- |500 || [[Masterball]] |- |10 || [[Small Restore]] |- |20 || [[Medium Restore]] |- |40 || [[Large Restore]] |- |}
===Upgrades=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Stage !! Reward |- | 5 || 25 [[Pokeball]] |- | 10 || 100 [[Pokeball]] |- | 20 || 100 [[Greatball]] |- | 30 || 100 [[Ultraball]] |- | 35 || 100 [[xClick]] |- | 40 || 100 [[x Attack]] |- | 50 || 100 [[Small Restore]] |- | 100 || Deoxys |- | 110 || 10 [[Water Stone]] |- | 120 || 10 [[Leaf Stone]] |- | 130 || 10 [[Thunder Stone]] |- | 140 || 10 [[Fire Stone]] |- | 150 || 200 [[Medium Restore]] |- | 160 || 100 [[Lucky Egg]] |- | 170 || 100 [[Lucky Incense]] |- | 180 || 100 [[Item Magnet]] |- | 190 || 10 [[Mystery Egg]] |- | 200 || 100 [[Large Restore]] |- | 210 || 40 [[Water Stone]] |- | 220 || 40 [[Leaf Stone]] |- | 230 || 40 [[Thunder Stone]] |- | 240 || 40 [[Moon Stone]] |- | 250 || 6400 [[Ultraball]] |- | 300 || 100 [[Trade Stone]] |}
After 300 Wins there aren't any known rewards, but there is a known record
===Record===
